post.description: Check the give Namespace name availability.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters to check availability of the given Namespace name

default.description: Eventhub error response describing why the operation failed.

value.description: Result of the List Namespace operation

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of namespaces.

EHNamespaceListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation

createdAt.description: The time the Namespace was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the Namespace was updated.

serviceBusEndpoint.description: Endpoint you can use to perform Service Bus operations.

isAutoInflateEnabled.description: Value that indicates whether AutoInflate is enabled for eventhub namespace.

maximumThroughputUnits.description: Upper limit of throughput units when AutoInflate is enabled, value should be within 0 to 20 throughput units. ( '0' if AutoInflateEnabled = true)

kafkaEnabled.description: Value that indicates whether Kafka is enabled for eventhub namespace.

properties.description: Namespace properties supplied for create namespace operation.

EHNamespace.description: Single Namespace item in List or Get Operation

tier.description: The billing tier of this particular SKU.

capacity.description: The Event Hubs throughput units, value should be 0 to 20 throughput units.

Sku.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create namespace operation

value.description: Result of the List Authorization Rules operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains an incomplete list of Authorization Rules

AuthorizationRuleListResult.description: The response from the List namespace operation.

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

properties.description: Properties supplied to create or update AuthorizationRule

AuthorizationRule.description: Single item in a List or Get AuthorizationRule operation

primaryConnectionString.description: Primary connection string of the created namespace AuthorizationRule.

secondaryConnectionString.description: Secondary connection string of the created namespace AuthorizationRule.

aliasPrimaryConnectionString.description: Primary connection string of the alias if GEO DR is enabled

aliasSecondaryConnectionString.description: Secondary  connection string of the alias if GEO DR is enabled

primaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

secondaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

keyName.description: A string that describes the AuthorizationRule.

key.description: Optional, if the key value provided, is set for KeyType or autogenerated Key value set for keyType

RegenerateAccessKeyParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Regenerate Authorization Rule operation, specifies which key needs to be reset.

partitionIds.description: Current number of shards on the Event Hub.

createdAt.description: Exact time the Event Hub was created.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the message was updated.

messageRetentionInDays.description: Number of days to retain the events for this Event Hub, value should be 1 to 7 days

partitionCount.description: Number of partitions created for the Event Hub, allowed values are from 1 to 32 partitions.

status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of the Event Hub.

properties.description: Properties supplied to the Create Or Update Event Hub operation.

Eventhub.description: Single item in List or Get Event Hub operation

enabled.description: A value that indicates whether capture description is enabled.

encoding.description: Enumerates the possible values for the encoding format of capture description. Note: 'AvroDeflate' will be deprecated in New API Version

intervalInSeconds.description: The time window allows you to set the frequency with which the capture to Azure Blobs will happen, value should between 60 to 900 seconds

sizeLimitInBytes.description: The size window defines the amount of data built up in your Event Hub before an capture operation, value should be between 10485760 to 524288000 bytes

destination.description: Properties of Destination where capture will be stored. (Storage Account, Blob Names)

skipEmptyArchives.description: A value that indicates whether to Skip Empty Archives

CaptureDescription.description: Properties to configure capture description for eventhub

storageAccountResourceId.description: Resource id of the storage account to be used to create the blobs

archiveNameFormat.description: Blob naming convention for archive, e.g. {Namespace}/{EventHub}/{PartitionId}/{Year}/{Month}/{Day}/{Hour}/{Minute}/{Second}. Here all the parameters (Namespace,EventHub .. etc) are mandatory irrespective of order

properties.description: Properties describing the storage account, blob container and archive name format for capture destination

Destination.description: Capture storage details for capture description

value.description: Result of the List EventHubs operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of EventHubs.

EventHubListResult.description: The result of the List EventHubs operation.

createdAt.description: Exact time the message was created.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the message was updated.

userMetadata.description: User Metadata is a placeholder to store user-defined string data with maximum length 1024. e.g. it can be used to store descriptive data, such as list of teams and their contact information also user-defined configuration settings can be stored.

properties.description: Single item in List or Get Consumer group operation

ConsumerGroup.description: Single item in List or Get Consumer group operation

value.description: Result of the List Consumer Group operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Consumer Group

ConsumerGroupListResult.description: The result to the List Consumer Group operation.

UnavailableReason.description: Specifies the reason for the unavailability of the service.

name.description: Name to check the namespace name availability

CheckNameAvailabilityParameter.description: Parameter supplied to check Namespace name availability operation

message.description: The detailed info regarding the reason associated with the Namespace.

nameAvailable.description: Value indicating Namespace is availability, true if the Namespace is available; otherwise, false.

reason.description: The reason for unavailability of a Namespace.

CheckNameAvailabilityResult.description: The Result of the CheckNameAvailability operation

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Event Hub operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Event Hub operations supported by the Microsoft.EventHub resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

Operation.description: A Event Hub REST API operation

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates EventHub service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) - possible values 'Accepted' or 'Succeeded' or 'Failed'

partnerNamespace.description: ARM Id of the Primary/Secondary eventhub namespace name, which is part of GEO DR pairing

alternateName.description: Alternate name specified when alias and namespace names are same.

role.description: role of namespace in GEO DR - possible values 'Primary' or 'PrimaryNotReplicating' or 'Secondary'

pendingReplicationOperationsCount.description: Number of entities pending to be replicated.

properties.description: Properties required to the Create Or Update Alias(Disaster Recovery configurations)

ArmDisasterRecovery.description: Single item in List or Get Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) operation

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration)

ArmDisasterRecoveryListResult.description: The result of the List Alias(Disaster Recovery configuration) operation.

value.description: Result of the List MessagingRegions type.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of MessagingRegions.

MessagingRegionsListResult.description: The response of the List MessagingRegions operation.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the messaging plan was updated.

id.description: Resource ID of Virtual Network Subnet

ignoreMissingVnetServiceEndpoint.description: Value that indicates whether to ignore missing VNet Service Endpoint

defaultAction.description: Default Action for Network Rule Set

value.description: Result of the List NetworkRuleSet operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of NetworkRuleSet.

NetworkRuleSetListResult.description: The response of the List NetworkRuleSet operation

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

SkipParameter.name: $skip
SkipParameter.description: Skip is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skip parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N usageDetails.
